nodes.text: Ashash was a waterworld located in the Ashash system, a part of the Zarracina sector in the Trailing Sectors portion of the Expansion Region. It was home to a species of creature that could emit a harmful gas from its body—an aspect in which the creature was similar to the stinkfish of the Outer Rim Territories planet Sedri.

Ashash was mentioned in Battle for the Golden Sun, a 1988 roleplaying game authored by Douglas Kaufman and published by West End Games for use with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Ashash system, and therefore the world Ashash, in grid square N-14.
